summary.para: Overrides the registry settings that determine how an autosearch is performed.

param.name: pdwSearchStyle
param.para: A pointer to a DWORD value that indicates how the search is performed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the text that is in the browser's Address bar.

param.name: pbstrSearchText
param.para: The BSTR that receives the text in the Address bar.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the URL that is being searched for.

param.name: pbstrSearchUrl
param.para: The BSTR that receives the URL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that channel customization information to the search hooks.
